the VCU Police Department was alerted early this morning about a dispute near campus that could have involved a weapon PERIOD Two people were involved in the incident near the  block of West Marshall Street PERIOD Shortly before  a.m PERIOD today a man reported to the Richmond Police Department that another man had threatened to shoot him after a dispute PERIOD
